name: Soul Catcher (itch) (untry)
description:
A prototype that was quickly put together in 3 days

Enemies drop souls when killed. Collect souls using cards (You collect souls automatically).

Hold out a card to use passive using 1 - 3.
Right click to activate one time card ability.

WASD to move

Click or click and hold to attack

Right click card to consume card. Hold out card to use passive
